title_full: MIGSUS01-BP01 Include sustainability considerations as part of your migration business case and preliminary assessments
title: Include sustainability considerations in migration business case and assessments
description: Identify a migration stakeholder to own sustainability goals. Include sustainability impact in the business case along with TCO and ROI calculations. Use tools like AWS Migration Evaluator to highlight estimated carbon emission reductions when migrating to AWS with right-sized workloads.
outcome: Sustainability integrated into migration business case with dedicated owner and quantified carbon emission reduction estimates.

title_full: MIGSUS02-BP01 Choose a Region for the workloads you plan to migrate based on your business requirements and your sustainability goals
title: Choose a Region based on business requirements and sustainability goals
description: Shortlist potential Regions based on business requirements (compliance, latency, cost, services). Select Regions near Amazon renewable energy projects or Regions where the grid has lower published carbon intensity to support sustainability goals.
outcome: Region selected that balances business requirements with sustainability goals including renewable energy availability.

title_full: MIGSUS03-BP01 Focus on efficiency across all aspects of infrastructure
title: Focus on efficiency across all aspects of infrastructure
description: Review on-premises capacity to plan workload requirements. Use elasticity in the cloud to meet demand. Identify redundancy, underutilization, and decommission targets. Use proven workflow templates like Migration Hub Orchestrator. Evaluate auto-scaling and define/update SLAs based on sustainability goals.
outcome: Infrastructure efficiency optimized by removing idle resources, implementing auto-scaling, and aligning SLAs with sustainability goals.

title_full: MIGSUS04-BP01 Adopt metrics that can signal the sustainability of your application
title: Adopt metrics that can signal the sustainability of your application
description: Adopt sustainability metrics relevant to the application. Leverage monitoring tools to define proxy metrics, business metrics, and sustainability KPIs. Document sustainability impact over time to enable iterative improvement. Introduce organizational dashboards to share sustainability metrics with stakeholders.
outcome: Sustainability metrics adopted and tracked with dashboards for stakeholder visibility.

title_full: MIGSUS04-BP02 Include sustainability metrics in the application portfolio analysis to drive migration and modernization initiatives
title: Include sustainability metrics in application portfolio analysis
description: Include sustainability metrics in application portfolio analysis to identify migration and modernization opportunities that improve sustainability.
outcome: Sustainability metrics integrated into portfolio analysis to prioritize sustainable migration and modernization initiatives.

title_full: MIGSUS05-BP01 Implement efficient workload design by leveraging the underlying infrastructure
title: Implement efficient workload design by leveraging the underlying infrastructure
description: Select most efficient hardware and services (managed services, serverless, Graviton). Gain insight into workload performance to identify optimization opportunities. Choose efficient programming languages and minimize code execution. Optimize software for asynchronous and scheduled jobs.
outcome: Efficient workload design implemented using optimal hardware, managed services, and efficient software patterns.

title_full: MIGSUS06-BP01 Identify environments and workloads that can be consolidated or retired
title: Identify environments and workloads that can be consolidated or retired
description: Identify non-production environments and workloads that can be retired or consolidated to reduce resource consumption and improve sustainability.
outcome: Non-production environments and workloads identified for consolidation or retirement.

title_full: MIGSUS06-BP02 Identify workloads that can use efficient software and architecture patterns to maintain consistent high utilization of deployed resources
title: Identify workloads that can use efficient software and architecture patterns
description: Identify workloads that can benefit from efficient software and architecture patterns to maintain high resource utilization.
outcome: Workloads identified for efficient architecture patterns that maximize resource utilization.

title_full: MIGSUS06-BP03 Analyze your data access patterns and data lifecycle processes, and evaluate how you can become more efficient and sustainable in your data management
title: Analyze data access patterns and lifecycle processes for efficiency
description: Define and implement data lifecycle process. Utilize data classification to support sustainability optimization. Leverage data access and storage patterns to select appropriate services and configurations. Use technologies supporting data access patterns with minimal processing requirements.
outcome: Data lifecycle and access patterns analyzed with appropriate storage solutions selected for sustainability.

title_full: MIGSUS06-BP04 Understand and influence business requirements, and optimize areas of code to reach your sustainability goals
title: Understand and influence business requirements, and optimize code for sustainability goals
description: Understand and influence business requirements related to sustainability. Optimize areas of code to improve efficiency and reach sustainability goals.
outcome: Business requirements influenced to support sustainability with code optimized for efficiency.

title: Implement data management practices
description: Avoid over-provisioning storage systems. Use shared file systems. Analyze data access and movement to identify efficiency opportunities. Evaluate RTO and RPO to design backup strategy based on business requirements. Choose the right migration tool and scale resources according to data volume. Use lifecycle policies and appropriate storage tiers.
outcome: Data management practices implemented including appropriate provisioning, backup strategy, and lifecycle policies.

title_full: MIGSUS08-BP01 Adopt methods that can reduce interim resource consumption during the migration
title: Adopt methods to reduce interim resource consumption during migration
description: Reduce interim resource consumption during migration by reconsidering migration of non-production environments, sharing migration resources across workloads, and reducing duration of deployment for interim resources. Minimize the 'double bubble' of running resources in both source and target environments.
outcome: Interim resource consumption minimized during migration through efficient resource sharing and reduced deployment durations.
